MacroButton.MB_InitRequest: System.SendMidi("out1", "note-on", 1 , 52 , 41); Strip[0].A2 = 0 Strip[0].A3 = 0 Strip[1].A2 = 0 Strip[1].A3 = 0 Bus[1].ReturnReverb = 0 Bus[1].ReturnDelay = 0 Bus[2].ReturnReverb = 0 Bus[2].ReturnDelay = 0
MacroButton.MB_OnRequest: System.SendMidi("out1", "note-on", 1 , 52 , 29 ); Strip[0].A2 = 1 Strip[0].A3 = 1 Strip[1].A2 = 1 Strip[1].A3 = 1 Bus[1].ReturnReverb = 10 Bus[1].ReturnDelay = 10 Bus[2].ReturnReverb = 10 Bus[2].ReturnDelay = 10
MacroButton.MB_OffRequest: System.SendMidi("out1", "note-on", 1 , 52 , 41); Strip[0].A2 = 0 Strip[0].A3 = 0 Strip[1].A2 = 0 Strip[1].A3 = 0 Bus[1].ReturnReverb = 0 Bus[1].ReturnDelay = 0 Bus[2].ReturnReverb = 0 Bus[2].ReturnDelay = 0
